      • EntityRenderer

        public EntityRenderer(StaticShader shader,
                      HitboxShader hitboxShader,
                      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
        Create a new EntityRenderer and initialize everything needed
        Parameters:
        shader - the shader used to render entities
        hitboxShader - the shader used to render hitboxes
        projectionMatrix - the projection matrix used by the MasterRenderer

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(java.util.Map<TexturedModel,java.util.List<RenderableObject>> entities)
        Render a set of entities to the screen sorted by model, allowing us to render every entity using a model without reloading it
        Parameters:
        entities - map of Model and Entities to render
